sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Pages.css'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Join Nevada's Largest Non MLS Broker

Keep your Nevada Real Estate license active without MLS fees, association dues or Realtor expenses

{/* Verified Impact Metrics */}

Are you a new licensee, who's ready to get started? Or a transferring licensee looking for a fresh start?

Hang Your License with Key Advantage Activate your Nevada license, earn commissions, and avoid MLS fees. We handle all paperwork through DocuSign and provide referral and non-MLS options with full brokerage support—simple, fast, and affordable.





Current Members

Key Advantage LLC operates one of Nevada’s largest real estate referral networks. With Key Advantage NOW, you can practice real estate without MLS membership, maintain traditional representation, and earn unmatched referral fees. Written referrals are quickly verified, ensuring you’re recognized as the procuring cause.

New Licensees

Key Advantage LLC is an ideal brokerage for new licensees, offering affordable plans to establish and maintain a Nevada real estate license. Avoid high startup and maintenance costs while practicing referral and non-MLS real estate with your active license.

Transferring Licensees

Key Advantage LLC is a top choice for licensees seeking a cost-effective way to maintain their Nevada real estate license. The brokerage offers both referral placement and non-MLS practice options, with simple steps to transfer your license and get started.

{/* Process Flow */} {/* Process Flow */}

Modern Brokerage. No MLS Fees. Full Support.

1

Keep your license active

  • Done with fees & dues?
  • Not using your license now?
  • Taking a break, moving, or retiring?

    • 2

    Active License, No MLS

  • Earn without the fees
  • Use standard forms
  • Sell new homes
  • Refer nationwide
  • Partner locally

    • 3

    Modern Digital Brokerage

  • Seamless paperwork with DocuSign
  • Fast payments with eChecks

    • ); }; export default Home;
